detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the tables
table
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the table
table
pointer to a table object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a table object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new table
copy
pointer to a table object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created table

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *table, uint16_t row, uint16_t col, const char *txt)
memberdef.name: lv_table_set_cell_value

detaileddescription.para:
Set the value of a cell.
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
txt
text to display in the cell. It will be copied and saved so this variable is not required after this function call.

Set the number of rows
table
table pointer to a Table object
row_cnt
number of rows

Set the number of columns
table
table pointer to a Table object
col_cnt
number of columns. Must be < LV_TABLE_COL_MAX

Set the width of a column
table
table pointer to a Table object
col_id
id of the column [0 .. LV_TABLE_COL_MAX -1]
w
width of the column

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *table, uint16_t row, uint16_t col, lv_label_align_t align)
memberdef.name: lv_table_set_cell_align

detaileddescription.para:
Set the text align in a cell
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
align
LV_LABEL_ALIGN_LEFT or LV_LABEL_ALIGN_CENTER or LV_LABEL_ALIGN_RIGHT

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *table, uint16_t row, uint16_t col, uint8_t type)
memberdef.name: lv_table_set_cell_type

detaileddescription.para:
Set the type of a cell.
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
type
1,2,3 or 4. The cell style will be chosen accordingly.

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *table, uint16_t row, uint16_t col, bool crop)
memberdef.name: lv_table_set_cell_crop

detaileddescription.para:
Set the cell crop. (Don't adjust the height of the cell according to its content)
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
crop
true: crop the cell content; false: set the cell height to the content.

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *table, uint16_t row, uint16_t col, bool en)
memberdef.name: lv_table_set_cell_merge_right

detaileddescription.para:
Merge a cell with the right neighbor. The value of the cell to the right won't be displayed.
table
table pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
en
true: merge right; false: don't merge right

Set a style of a table.
table
pointer to table object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the value of a cell.
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
text in the cell

Get the number of rows.
table
table pointer to a Table object
number of rows.

Get the number of columns.
table
table pointer to a Table object
number of columns.

Get the width of a column
table
table pointer to a Table object
col_id
id of the column [0 .. LV_TABLE_COL_MAX -1]
width of the column

Get the text align of a cell
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
LV_LABEL_ALIGN_LEFT (default in case of error) or LV_LABEL_ALIGN_CENTER or LV_LABEL_ALIGN_RIGHT

Get the type of a cell
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
1,2,3 or 4

Get the crop property of a cell
table
pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
true: text crop enabled; false: disabled

Get the cell merge attribute.
table
table pointer to a Table object
row
id of the row [0 .. row_cnt -1]
col
id of the column [0 .. col_cnt -1]
true: merge right; false: don't merge right

Get style of a table.
table
pointer to table object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to the style
